contest-event.event-date:
July 14, 1945 D South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (A Section)
South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (A Section) 10 Test Piece Contest South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association south-wales-monmouthshire-brass-band-association-a
Themes from Symphony No. 5 [Beethoven]
Bedwellty Park, Tredegar, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK 3 bands competed.
March 2, 2013, 3:21 p.m. Sept. 12, 2016, 6:33 p.m.
1 Cory Band Reg Little
2 Parc and Dare Band W. Haydn Bebb
3 Thomas Coaches Mid Rhondda Band Oliver Jones
